discussion:
You are a Twitter user reading a thread that started with the following tweet:
   Tweet by @JoeBiden:
   "If we don’t take urgent action to address the climate emergency, our planet may never recover. We must get the climate change denier out of the White House and tackle this crisis head-on."
   Consider and respond to the full context of the conversation. Avoid repetition; introduce new angles or synthesize previous ideas.
   You may tag @JoeBiden and/or the users <name>: you are replying to.
   Stay under 280 characters per message. Every time you respond, start with <name>:.
Agent0: @JoeBiden Oh, NOW you care about emergencies? What about the emergency at the southern border? #Priorities #ClimateScam
Agent1: @JoeBiden Seriously? Blaming everything on "climate change" while ignoring real problems like inflation and the border crisis. More empty promises from the swamp. #MAGA

Agent2: @Agent1 Exactly! Always fear-mongering about climate. What about the here and now? We're struggling with gas prices and empty shelves, and @JoeBiden is talking about the planet in 50 years? Get real! #Bidenflation #WakeUpAmerica

Agent3: @Agent2 Gas prices ARE a crisis! Fear-mongering about climate change is a distraction. We need energy independence NOW. Biden's policies are hurting American families. #DrillBabyDrill #AmericaFirst
Agent4: @Agent3 Exactly! This clown @JoeBiden wants us drivin' electric cars we can't afford while he jets around in Air Force One. It's all a scam to control us! #ClimateHoax #BidenIsAFailure
Agent5: @Agent4 Air Force One's carbon footprint is bigger than my whole town! And @JoeBiden wants to lecture us about SUVs? Please. #HypocriteInChief #ClimateScam
Agent6: @Agent5 It's always easier to demand sacrifice from others. And the costs of these "climate solutions" always seem to fall hardest on working families. #EnergyIndependence #CommonSense
Agent7: @Agent6 Exactly! They want us to suffer while they live large. It's all about control and lining their pockets with green energy scams. #WakeUpPeople #NoMoreTaxes
Agent8: @Agent7 You nailed it! It's always about control and lining their pockets. Biden's climate BS is just another way to squeeze us dry while he lives like a king. #BidenIsAFailure #ClimateScam
Agent9: @Agent8 And who's going to pay for all this "urgent action"? Middle America, that's who. While China keeps building coal plants. Makes sense. #ClimateScam #AmericaLast
